last_episode_to_air.name: The Best Of Travels with My Father
last_episode_to_air.overview: With their final trip behind them, Jack and Michael sit down to reflect on the entire experience and view some of the most memorable highlights.

name: Jack Whitehall: Travels with My Father
original_name: Jack Whitehall: Travels with My Father
overview: Comic Jack Whitehall invites his stodgy, unadventurous father to travel with him to odd locations and events in an attempt to strengthen their bond.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Jovial comic Jack Whitehall invites his stuffy father, Michael, to travel with him through Southeast Asia in an attempt to strengthen their bond.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Comedian Jack Whitehall and his father Michael  are back on the road in Europe, but now it’s Michael taking the lead – and he has very different ideas...

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Now living and working in LA, Jack hopes to convince a reluctant Michael to move to the U.S. by showing him what the American West has to offer.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Following a year of lockdown, Hilary can't wait for Jack to take Michael away on a last journey, but this time they’re staying close to home in the UK.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael begin their journey in Bangkok and immediately clash over accommodations, then visit an odd temple and attend an elephant polo match.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In Bangkok, the Whitehalls patronize an unusual doll shop. An annoyed Michael needs time away from Jack, so Jack goes off on his own to try parkour.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In Phuket, Jack tries to get his dad to loosen up at a full moon party, then seeks his emotional support in a floating football match.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Now in Cambodia, Jack and Michael take a primitive train ride. Jack obsesses over finding food his dad would enjoy, and they visit Angkor Wat.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In Siem Reap, Jack upsets Michael at a puppet show, then Jack observes rats that help clear minefields. Later, the pair seeks some peace in Vietnam.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael honor Michael's parents in a ritual and visit a performance artist in Hanoi, then reflect on the impact of their journey.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Jovial comic Jack Whitehall invites his stuffy father, Michael, to travel with him through Southeast Asia in an attempt to strengthen their bond.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Michael bosses his son with "dry history" in Germany's Bavarian Alps, while Jack tries to liven up their first stop with motorcycles and skies.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael channel Harry Houdini and take a boat ride in Budapest, and then have an odd border control experience on a road trip to Transylvania.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In Romaina, Michael and Jack pay a visit to "royalty" and an unusual cemetery. Later, they go to a little visited Moldova to meet Sunstroke Project.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Michael puts Jack through military training in Kiev, and then they head to Chernobyl before Jack drags his dad to a clown festival in Odessa.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Jack treats his father to a luxurious birthday trip to Istanbul, where they visit a hookah lounge and Michael recalls a wild night with David Bowie.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Comedian Jack Whitehall and his father Michael  are back on the road in Europe, but now it’s Michael taking the lead – and he has very different ideas...

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In LA, Jack and Michael take in some naked yoga, acting lessons and a tour of Compton. Then they ride a bus to Phoenix, where Jack becomes a wrestler.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After stops in Sun City and Tombstone, Arizona, Jack and Michael go to Las Vegas, where a surprise guest could ruin Jack's "lads and dads" itinerary.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Now living and working in LA, Jack hopes to convince a reluctant Michael to move to the U.S. by showing him what the American West has to offer.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In Sydney, Hilary joins the boys and goes head-to-head with Jack in cricket, while father and son compete in a drag show and Jack tries speed dating.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael head to Queensland and Uluru, where they meet a senior biker “gang,” celebrate Australia Day and rub elbows with emus and camels.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The boys kick off their final journey with a meal from Gordon Ramsay, then try Morris dancing, tour Winston Churchill’s home and visit Burgh Island.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael herd sheep in Wales, hike the Lake District with llamas, search for "Nessie" in the Scottish Highlands and ride a "Harry Potter" train.

episodes.name: The Best Of Travels with My Father
episodes.overview: With their final trip behind them, Jack and Michael sit down to reflect on the entire experience and view some of the most memorable highlights.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Following a year of lockdown, Hilary can't wait for Jack to take Michael away on a last journey, but this time they’re staying close to home in the UK.
